message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $130. I think it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $130 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. How about we meet in the middle at $115? This product is truly worth the investment.
I'm still interested, but $115 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  $95 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $105 as a final offer. This is a great price for something you'll get so much use out of.
I'm still interested, but $105 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
